exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.instructions: Start in a plank position. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your hips as if sitting in a chair, keeping your chest up and back straight. Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold a push-up position, with your body forming a straight line from head to heels. Engage your core and hold.

nutrition.info: Protein is essential for muscle repair and growth. Good sources include chicken, beef, fish, eggs, dairy, and legumes. Aim for 1.6-2.2 grams of protein per kilogram of body weight for muscle building.
Carbohydrates are the body's main source of energy. Complex carbs like oats, brown rice, and sweet potatoes provide sustained energy for workouts.
Staying hydrated is crucial for performance and recovery. Drink at least 8-10 glasses of water a day, and more if you are active. Dehydration can lead to decreased strength and fatigue.
